game.name: Bound By Flame
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You are a mercenary possessed by a flame demon in a desperate world ravaged by seven Ice Lords. In this RPG where every choice counts, you will have to choose between unleashing the powers of the beast within and rejecting its demonic influence.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are a mercenary possessed by a flame demon in a desperate world ravaged by seven Ice Lords. In this RPG where every choice counts, you will have to choose between unleashing the powers of the beast within and rejecting its demonic influence.

reviewHighlights.text: 하라고 추천은 못하겠는데 값을 생각하면 할만함 조작감도 구데기까지는 아니여서 재미는 솔직히 모르겠음 비슷한 상위호환 겜들을 3배 4배하는게 나을지도 그럼 비추
어렸을 적의 멋도 모르던 나는 이 핵 폐기물을 풀프라이스로 구매하였다. 어렸을 적의 나에게 치얼스.
